Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Feedback from teachers varies subject to subject while GenAI is fairly consistent.  Unfortunately I have had errors from both teachers and GenAI that I needed to figure out myself.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Teachers are usually my first port of call however, if the issue is beyond them then I turn to GenAI.  i.e. I had an issue making a java program into a .jar file ~ my tutor couldnt help me but chatGPT could.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Depending on the Teacher GPT can be more friendly and give a more thorough answer.  I dont have to wait for an email or go find a teacher when I can just ask a question in my browser.
